```{r figure1, echo=FALSE, fig.cap='Miles per Gallon', warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
data(mtcars)
ggplot(mtcars, aes(x=mpg)) + geom_histogram()
```



```{r figure2, echo=FALSE, fig.cap='Weight', warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
data(mtcars)
ggplot(mtcars, aes(x=wt)) + geom_histogram()
```
